statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logging ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, activity_time, activity_description FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT activity_description FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY activity_time ASC
SELECT id, user_id, activity_time FROM blockchain_security_logging
SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY activity_time DESC
SELECT id, activity_time, activity_description FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE activity_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT user_id, activity_time, activity_description FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id = 456 ORDER BY activity_time ASC
SELECT id, user_id, activity_description FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE activity_description LIKE '%login%' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM blockchain_security_logging WHERE activity_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs;
SELECT log_timestamp, action FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE action = 'transfer' AND details LIKE '%success%';
SELECT event_timestamp, event_type, description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs WHERE action = 'transaction'
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01'
SELECT log_id, action, details FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs;
SELECT log_id, activity FROM blockchain_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT timestamp, activity FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event = 'Login Failed';
SELECT log_id, user_id FROM network_logs WHERE action = 'Connection Denied';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC, log_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity FROM blockchain_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, user_id, activity FROM blockchain_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND user_id IN (1,2,3) ORDER BY user_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, activity FROM blockchain_logs WHERE activity LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs JOIN security_logs ON blockchain_logs.log_id = security_logs.log_id WHERE blockchain_logs.timestamp <= security_logs.timestamp ORDER BY blockchain_logs.log_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM blockchain_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM blockchain_security WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM blockchain_users WHERE username LIKE 'user_%';
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM blockchain_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM blockchain_security ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_size FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_size > 1000;
SELECT miner_id, miner_name, total_blocks_mined FROM blockchain_miners WHERE total_blocks_mined >= 50;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender='Alice' AND recipient='Bob';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_size > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE miner_id = 3 AND block_size < 200 ORDER BY block_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000.00 AND sender = 'Alice' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT sender, recipient, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender != recipient ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT monitor_id, monitor_name FROM blockchain_monitors WHERE monitor_type = 'Public' ORDER BY monitor_id;
